items.requirement: Does the entity recognize financial assets and financial liabilities in its statement of financial position when it becomes a party to the contractual provisions of the instrument?
Examples.requirement: Does the entity derecognize financial assets only when the contractual rights to cash flows expire or are transferred with substantially all risks and rewards?

References.requirement: Does the entity apply the derecognition criteria to transfers that qualify for derecognition?
Does the entity derecognize financial liabilities only when obligations are discharged, cancelled or expire?

items.requirement: Does the entity classify financial assets into appropriate categories (held-to-maturity, loans and receivables, available-for-sale, fair value through profit or loss)?
Does the entity measure financial assets at fair value on initial recognition plus transaction costs (except for FVTPL)?
Does the entity apply appropriate subsequent measurement for each category of financial assets?
Does the entity measure financial liabilities at amortized cost using the effective interest method (except for trading liabilities)?
Does the entity designate financial instruments as at fair value through profit or loss only when strict criteria are met?
Does the entity assess at each reporting date whether there is objective evidence of impairment for financial assets?
Does the entity recognize impairment losses for financial assets when objective evidence of impairment exists?
Does the entity measure impairment losses for loans and receivables as the difference between carrying amount and present value of estimated future cash flows?
Does the entity reverse impairment losses for available-for-sale debt instruments when the fair value increases?
Does the entity prohibit reversal of impairment losses for available-for-sale equity instruments?
Does the entity apply hedge accounting only when strict criteria are met, including formal documentation?
Does the entity test hedge effectiveness at inception and on an ongoing basis?
Does the entity discontinue hedge accounting when effectiveness criteria are no longer met?
Does the entity account for fair value hedges by recognizing hedge gains/losses in profit or loss?
Does the entity account for cash flow hedges by recognizing effective hedge gains/losses in other comprehensive income?
Does the entity account for net investment hedges similar to cash flow hedges?
Does the entity disclose the significance of financial instruments for its financial position and performance?
Does the entity disclose accounting policies for financial instruments including recognition and measurement policies?
Does the entity provide disclosures about hedge accounting including hedge relationships and hedge effectiveness?
Does the entity disclose fair value information for financial instruments?
Does the entity disclose impairment losses and reversals for each class of financial asset?
